attributes.review: FIRST of all, I never liked out president but I gave him a chance by downloading this app to find reason for the things he did. But instead, I was disappointed with the low quality of the app and ANYONE could leave a 5 star review. (I never really gave him another chance)
attributes.title: This is the ABSOULUTE WORST APP

attributes.review: As soon as I opened it my screen started glitching and then my whole phone shut down. When I turned it back on everything seemed fine, but I could no longer open this app. 1/5 stars. Needs an update.
attributes.title: Glitchy

attributes.review: I got this app to see what is so good about our president but then it started sending me some racist news. I kept trying to stop it but it wouldn’t. It kept going for about a week and then it started sending news about how they want to get rid of non white people.

my grandma downloaded this app onto her phone, while her friend and her friends dog was over. after she logged in a saw the information posted inside the dog was sitting on her lap watching the screen. as soon as the dog saw trump she bolted out an open window never to be seen again! my grandmas friend started panicking and ran away with the dog too, she hasn’t seen them since! this app has broken the friendship of my grandma and her friend, and also the screen on her window, she is furious. 😡
attributes.title: caused my grandmas friend’s dog to run away 😡

attributes.review: This app makes my phone glitch and take over my storage. It’s doesn’t give me the information that I need it makes me really upset I wish they could work on it or at least delete this app it’s so pointless.
attributes.title: This app is not it don’t download

attributes.review: They ask for your phone number and other personal things then give them to people last night my phone continuously buzzed from unknown numbers telling me   why I should vote for Trump 2020
attributes.title: Giving away personal information

attributes.review: I’m 11 and I still hate trump as bad as everyone else! I’m a black and blm! I got the app just so I could give it a one star. Why was he elected again? And he didn’t even build the wall (I don’t want him to) but  i just hate this man so much I don’t even know where to start.
attributes.title: Obama is my president

attributes.review: He is bringing TikTok down, so gen z will bring down whom every brings it down. Before you get all mad just know that as teens, gen z is making more change for the better with less than 20 years on the planet. You have already destroyed vine and now TikTok, what is next...Instagram? Snapchat?
attributes.title: TIKTOK

attributes.review: Who didn’t tell me that some ninjas and fairies and a kinda tall orange man would come to my house if downloaded, not to mention it took hours for it to download while having the best of WiFi’s now imagine how I felt when the just elastic in here ready to do what they wanted, truly horrendous
attributes.title: 🤡 The Fake App 🤡

attributes.review: This app glitch so bad and never loaded. Every time I went to use it, it froze my phone. I am so over this app. I don’t want to waste my time with a long review so that is why I’m just going to say for other people who want to download this, don’t. You will waste your time.
attributes.title: Worst Ever
